name: Tic Tac Toe Apple Watch
description:
#Top 200 in Games in more than 4 Countries!
#Was Featured by Apple in "Best Puzzle Games"!

Tic Tac Toe Apple Watch Edition is the classical Tic Tac Toe that you know and love, but for iOS and Apple Watch! It's no longer the time to use pen and paper!

Features:

- The feeling of playing the classical Tic Tac Toe on paper
- Clean Interface
- Apple Watch support included
- Challenging AI
- Share how many times you won to anyone, in a second.
